title: MSSQL - Bug with empty username/password
author: Cool34000
body_snippet:
Hi,

I'm using mRemoteNG 1.76.20.24615 with MSSQL database support.
Everything is running fine.

Now I'm trying to authenticate users with their logged on Active Directory user.
I have created 2 groups: one to give RW acces to the database and another to give RO access to the database.
So the "username" and "password" fields in SQL Server authentication options must be empty (as I'm using AD group).
When I test connection, all is working fine (connection test OK, remote connections list ...
